title: Pizza Review: Sal's Pizzeria & Grill
text:
Pizza Review: Sal's Pizzeria & Grill PNJ Pizza Pros 12:19 p.m. CDT October 15, 2015 Buy Photo Sal's Pizzeria and Grill's Supreme pizza (Photo: PNJ Pizza Pros) Buy Photo 5 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
October is National Pizza month - and throughout the month, a select team of PNJ Pizza Pros will be checking out Pensacola-area pizzerias in search of the area's best pies. At the end of the month, each of our judges will name their Top 3 area favorites. 
Here is today's short and sweet review: 
Sal's Pizzeria and Grill 
PIZZA PRO 1: One of our sports writers is obsessed with this place, and I can see why. I ordered the supreme, with your usual assembly of meats and veggies and it was good. It has a thin, crispy crust and I really liked the sauce. It also looks like it would be a fun place to watch sports, with plenty of TV and European soccer club banners on the walls. 
GUEST PIZZA PRO: Sal's has great pizza. It's the only (pizza place) around here that actually has New York-style pizza. 
GUEST PIZZA PRO: Sal's Pizzeria and Grill is excellent. Every visit my family has been treated like we are their family. Both owners have always taken the time to talk with us, not just about the food, but about us. 
GUEST PIZZA PRO: Sal's Pizzeria is by far THE BEST pizza in Navarre. The owners treat all of their customers like family. Best authentic Italian food. Food has been consistently good for the 20 years I've been going. 
Sal's Pizzeria and Grill , 6903 Navarre Parkway, Navarre. Hours of operation 11 a.m. to 9 p.m. Monday to Thrusday; 11 a.m. to 10 p.m. Friday; 5 to 10 p.m. Saturday; closed on Sundays. 932-8240. 
Catch up on past pizza reviews: 
GET IN ON THE FUN 
We want to hear from you. Send us photos of your favorite pizzas along with a Twitter-length review — no more than 120 characters — via email to communitycontent@pnj.com or on Twitter or Instagram using #PNJpizza. We'll share the most popular choices and some of your comments with our hungry readers, as well. 
And no, you're not limited to the Pensacola city limits, but please keep your responses to Escambia and Santa Rosa counties. 5 CONNECT 2 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://on.pnj.com/1LvVTEr MORE STORIES
